entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SDK commands like `restore` `build` and `list` incorrectly warn about vulnerable NuGet packages hoisted by the shared runtime #43063
  • Dotnet format should take a single file #43056
  • Daily build: blazor-wasm project build fails on NU1102: Unable to find package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly with version (>= 9.0.0-rc.2.24426.2) #43050
  • Daily build: microsoft.netcore.app.runtime.mono.android-arm is not found while installing MAUI workload on .NET 9 #43049

Closed

  • [NETE2ESDK]With NET 9 RC1 SDK installed, “Android-35” is missing in the output of "dotnet workload search" after installing workload. #43051
  • `dotnet tool update` skips NuGet package signature verification #37469
    8.0.4xx
  • dotnet tool has a verbosity mode but it isn't silent in mode "quiet" #35173
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Backport: add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools (#39268) #43060
    untriaged, Area-Tools, DO NOT MERGE, Backport when open, 9.0.2xx
  • Handle --list-tests in dotnet test #43058
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43052
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up error experience when downloading non-tools #43045
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.1xx

Merged

  • Revert disabling the toolset package in Helix #42860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit workload restore to work with new global.json #42606
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools, Backport when open
  • Add net10.0 known framework references #42969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Static web assets] Reduce allocations on DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints #43038
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable --source for global/path tool install #42965
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.1xx
  • Send "workload set not installed" messages #42683
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 9.0.1xx
  • Enable workload search for users to find latest set versions #42652
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 9.0.1xx
  • Temporary fix for the cppcli tests #42811
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Android workload manifests to SB .NET SDK #42125
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workload set garbage collection #42475
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • Add code to containers check to allow users to silence it #42501
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Warn when enabling Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #43039
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
